name: XCUIElementSnapshot
desc: A set of attributes to express a snapshot of an element’s attributes and descendant user interface hierarchy.

items.name: var children: [XCUIElementSnapshot]
items.desc: An array of descendant user interface element snapshots.

items.name: var dictionaryRepresentation: [XCUIElement.AttributeName : Any]
items.desc: A hierarchical dictionary representation of an element’s attributes, and all of an element’s user interface descendants.
